actionTemplate.title: Hydrating base routine for dry skin
steps: Mist a hydrating setting spray first
Use dewy/brightening primer; even tone so you can skip heavy foundation
Conceal obvious dark areas in thin layers
Apply foundation by zones; match shades to natural light/shadow
Skip powder or dust lightly; finish with spray for a fresh glow

rationaleTemplate: Hydration first helps makeup fuse with skin
Light powder keeps glow without emphasizing dryness
